00102 int Champ_Q1_EF::imprime(Sortie& os, int ncomp) const
00103 {
00104   const Zone_dis_base& zone_dis = zone_dis_base();
00105   const Zone& zone = zone_dis.zone();
00106   const DoubleTab& coord=zone.domaine().coord_sommets();
00107   const int nb_som = zone.domaine().nb_som();
00108   const DoubleTab& val = valeurs();
00109   int som;
00110   os << nb_som << finl;
00111   for (som=0; som<nb_som; som++)
00112     {
00113       if (dimension==3)
00114         os << coord(som,0) << " " << coord(som,1) << " " << coord(som,2) << " " ;
00115       if (dimension==2)
00116         os << coord(som,0) << " " << coord(som,1) << " " ;
00117       if (nb_compo_ == 1)
00118         os << val(som) << finl;
00119       else
00120         os << val(som,ncomp) << finl;
00121     }
00122   os << finl;
00123   Cout << "Champ_Q1_EF::imprime FIN >>>>>>>>>> " << finl;
00124   return 1;
00125 }
00126 
00127 void Champ_Q1_EF::gradient(DoubleTab& gradient_elem)
00128 {
00129 // Calcul du gradient de la vitesse pour le calcul de la vorticite
00130 // Gradient ordre 1 (valeur moyenne dans un element)
00131 // Order 1 gradient (mean value within an element)
00132   const Zone_EF& zone_EF_ = zone_EF();
00133   const DoubleTab& vitesse = equation().inconnue().valeurs();
00134   const IntTab& elems= zone_EF_.zone().les_elems();
00135   int nb_som_elem=zone_EF_.zone().nb_som_elem();
00136   int nb_elems=zone_EF_.zone().nb_elem_tot();
00137   const DoubleVect& volume_thilde=zone_EF_.volumes_thilde();
00138   const DoubleTab& Bij_thilde=zone_EF_.Bij_thilde();
00139 
00140   assert(gradient_elem.dimension(0) == nb_elems);
00141   assert(gradient_elem.dimension(1) == dimension); //!< line
00142   assert(gradient_elem.dimension(2) == dimension); //!< column
00143 
00144   operator_egal(gradient_elem, 0.); //!< Espace reel uniquement
00145 
00146   for (int num_elem=0; num_elem<nb_elems; num_elem++)
00147     {
00148       for (int a=0; a<dimension; a++) //!< composante numero 1, component number 1
00149         {
00150           for (int b=0; b<dimension; b++) //!< composante numero 2, component number 2
00151             {
00152               for (int j=0; j<nb_som_elem; j++)
00153                 {
00154                   int s = elems(num_elem,j);
00155                   gradient_elem(num_elem,a,b) += vitesse(s,a)*Bij_thilde(num_elem,j,b);
00156                 }
00157               gradient_elem(num_elem,a,b) /= volume_thilde(num_elem);
00158             }
00159         }
00160     }
00161 }
00162 
00163 void Champ_Q1_EF::cal_rot_ordre1(DoubleTab& vorticite)
00164 {
00165   const Zone_EF& zone_EF_ = zone_EF();
00166   int nb_elems=zone_EF_.zone().nb_elem_tot();
00167 
00168   DoubleTab gradient_elem(0, dimension, dimension);
00169 // le tableau est initialise dans la methode gradient():
00170   zone_EF_.zone().creer_tableau_elements(gradient_elem, Array_base::NOCOPY_NOINIT);
00171   gradient(gradient_elem);
00172   Debog::verifier("apres calcul gradient",gradient_elem);
00173   int num_elem;
00174   switch(dimension)
00175     {
00176     case 2 :
00177       {
00178         for (num_elem=0; num_elem<nb_elems; num_elem++)
00179           {
00180             vorticite(num_elem)=gradient_elem(num_elem,1,0)-gradient_elem(num_elem,0,1);
00181           }
00182       }
00183       break;
00184     case 3 :
00185       {
00186         for (num_elem=0; num_elem<nb_elems; num_elem++)
00187           {
00188             vorticite(num_elem,0)=gradient_elem(num_elem,2,1)-gradient_elem(num_elem,1,2);
00189             vorticite(num_elem,1)=gradient_elem(num_elem,0,2)-gradient_elem(num_elem,2,0);
00190             vorticite(num_elem,2)=gradient_elem(num_elem,1,0)-gradient_elem(num_elem,0,1);
00191           }
00192       }
00193     }
00194   Debog::verifier("apres calcul vort",vorticite);
00195   return ;
00196 }
